casebody.data:
Jennifer Cleland GREEN
v.
Stanley Boyd GREEN No. 376P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Green, Stanley Boyd. Robin J. Stinson, Attorney at Law, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, William S. Durr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Mary V. Cavanagh, Attorney at Law, Winterville, for Green, Jennifer Cleland

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 20th of November 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
